name: Dos de vos
description:
• Move mouse to play.
  • Hold mouse button to restart.
  • F for fullscreen.
  • Useless words: sol, tanner.

Night and day are the pretty much same, you swim effortlessly from one to the other like you were raised in dreams of them. But night and day could not be more different, each spinning laugh tearing your mind apart.

Why are the others so dangerous? Will they crush you themselves, or are they no match for the thirst that will surely crush you?

There are two of you. That much you know.
